data.name: Status_Connected
data.comment: Device connection status when successfully connected

data.name: Status_Disconnected
data.comment: Device connection status when not connected

data.name: Status_Error
data.comment: Device connection status when an error occurred

data.name: Status_PassiveMonitoring
data.comment: Device connection status when passively monitoring bus traffic

data.name: Status_PassiveMonitoringFormat
data.comment: Brief status format for passive monitoring. {0} = baud rate

data.name: Device_SerialNumberPrefix
data.comment: Prefix for device serial number display

data.name: Status_ConnectionFormat
data.comment: Brief connection status format. {0} = address, {1} = baud rate

data.comment: Title for the Connect page

data.name: Connect_DiscoveryWarning
data.value: Discovery ne fonctionnera correctement qu’avec un seul appareil connecté
data.comment: Warning message about device discovery

data.name: Connect_PassiveMonitorInfo
data.value: Passive monitoring allows debugging third-party OSDP systems by listening to bus traffic without sending commands
data.comment: Information about passive monitoring mode

data.comment: Checkbox text for default key option

data.comment: Checkbox text to enable decryption with default OSDP key

data.name: Connect_CustomKey
data.comment: Label for custom security key input in passive monitoring mode

data.comment: Button text to connect to device

data.comment: Message when device is not identified

data.comment: Message when device is not connected

data.comment: Message when monitoring is disabled for secure connections

data.value: Une mise à jour sera bientôt publiée pour prendre en charge le canal sécurisé
data.comment: Message about future secure channel support

data.comment: Badge shown when communication is not encrypted

data.comment: Badge shown when using secure channel with the default security key

data.comment: Badge shown when using secure channel with a custom security key

data.name: Monitor_NoDecryption
data.comment: Badge shown when passive monitoring without a security key configured

data.name: Monitor_DefaultKey
data.comment: Badge shown when passive monitoring with default key decryption

data.name: Monitor_CustomKey
data.comment: Badge shown when passive monitoring with custom key decryption

data.name: Status_AttemptingToConnect
data.comment: Status when attempting to connect to device

data.name: Status_InvalidSecurityKey
data.comment: Status when security key is invalid

data.name: Status_AttemptingToDiscover
data.comment: Status when starting device discovery

data.name: Status_AttemptingToDiscoverAtBaudRate
data.value: Tentative de découverte de l’appareil à l’adresse {0}
data.comment: Status when discovering at specific baud rate. {0} = baud rate

data.name: Status_FoundDeviceAtBaudRate
data.comment: Status when device found at baud rate. {0} = baud rate

data.name: Status_AttemptingToDetermineDevice
data.value: Tentative de détermination de l’appareil à {0} avec adresse {1}
data.comment: Status when determining device. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.name: Status_AttemptingToIdentifyDevice
data.value: Tentative d’identification de l’appareil à {0} avec adresse {1}
data.comment: Status when identifying device. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.name: Status_AttemptingToGetCapabilities
data.value: Tentative d’obtention des capacités de l’appareil à {0} avec adresse {1}
data.comment: Status when getting device capabilities. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.name: Status_SuccessfullyDiscovered
data.value: Appareil découvert avec succès {0} avec adresse {1}
data.comment: Status when device successfully discovered. {0} = baud rate, {1} = address

data.name: Status_FailedToConnect
data.value: Échec de la connexion à l’appareil
data.comment: Status when connection failed

data.name: Status_ErrorWhileDiscovering
data.value: Erreur lors de la découverte de l’appareil
data.comment: Status when error occurred during discovery

data.name: Status_CancelledDiscovery
data.comment: Status when discovery was cancelled

data.name: Status_AttemptingToConnectManually
data.comment: Status when attempting manual connection

data.name: Status_DeviceDisconnectedUSBRemoved
data.comment: Status when device disconnected due to USB removal

data.name: USB_DeviceConnected
data.comment: Message when USB device is connected

data.name: USB_DeviceDisconnected
data.comment: Message when USB device is disconnected

data.name: Dialog_Connect_Title
data.comment: Title for connection dialog

data.name: Dialog_InvalidSecurityKeyMessage
data.value: Clé de sécurité saisie non valide. {0}
data.comment: Error message for invalid security key. {0} = exception message

data.name: Error_InitializingSerialPorts
data.value: Erreur lors de l’initialisation des ports série : {0}
data.comment: Console error when serial port initialization fails. {0} = error message

data.name: Error_HandlingUSBDeviceChange
data.value: Erreur de gestion du changement de périphérique USB : {0}
data.comment: Console error when USB device change handling fails. {0} = error message

data.name: Dialog_PerformingAction_Title
data.comment: Title for dialog when performing device action

data.name: Dialog_UpdateCommunications_Title
data.comment: Title for update communications dialog

data.name: Dialog_UpdateCommunications_NoChange
data.value: Les paramètres de communication n’ont pas changé.
data.comment: Message when communication parameters haven't changed

data.name: Dialog_UpdateCommunications_Success
data.value: Mettez à jour avec succès les communications, en vous reconnectant avec de nouveaux paramètres.
data.comment: Message when communication parameters updated successfully

data.name: Dialog_ResetDevice_Title
data.comment: Title for reset device dialog

data.name: Dialog_ResetDevice_Confirmation
data.value: Voulez-vous réinitialiser l’appareil, si c’est le cas, redémarrez l’appareil, puis cliquez sur oui lorsque l’appareil démarre.
data.comment: Confirmation message for device reset

data.name: Dialog_ResetDevice_Success
data.value: Envoi réussi des commandes de réinitialisation - effectué. Redémarrez l’appareil, puis effectuez une découverte.
data.comment: Message when device reset successful

data.name: Dialog_ResetDevice_Failed
data.value: Echec de la réinitialisation de l’appareil. Effectuez une détection pour vous reconnecter à l’appareil.
data.comment: Message when device reset failed

data.name: Dialog_VendorInformation_Title
data.comment: Title for vendor information dialog

data.name: Error_OUILookupFailed
data.comment: Error message when OUI lookup fails. {0} = exception message

data.comment: Button text to collapse row details

data.comment: Label for commands sent statistic

data.comment: Label for replies received statistic

data.comment: Label for poll packets statistic

data.comment: Label for NAK replies statistic

data.name: Monitor_LineQuality
data.comment: Label for line quality percentage statistic

data.comment: Checkbox label to prevent future language mismatch prompts

data.comment: Common Yes button text
